text_block_list.text: I came to the shrine with Matikanetannhauser, who hasn't been in good form lately.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Alright, I'll say a prayer now.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Nam nam... May I get to eat lots of delicious things...!
I'm in the mood for pudding today...!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Phew. I hope it comes true.
choice_data_list: ...Didn't we come here to improve your form?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: --Ah! That's right!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I'll redo it, so please wait a moment!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
God, I have an additional request.
My form hasn't been great, so please do something about it! I beg you~!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: That's it! Now all that's left is to do my best!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Huh? ...What's that!?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
It's from Fukuchan-senpai!
Apparently, her lucky item was pudding, and she bought some for me too while she was at it!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: For my wish to come true this quickly, the divine favor is already~!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
God, thank you for the pudding!
Next, I'll ask for shortcake!
Whether this incident was the turning point or not, Matikanetannhauser regained her form after that!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
--Huh? Oh~!
What a surprise, there's pudding on the ground!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Though, it's just an empty container.
Did someone throw it away...?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Oh well, I'll pick it up and put it in the trash--

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Gyaaaaah!! A spiiider!!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
There's a spider in the container~!
P-please! Just spare my life--!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Ugh... Thank you for throwing it in the trash for me instead.
Trainer, you're my lifesaver.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ...But good things don't happen that easily, do they...?
Matikanetannhauser lost her motivation and remained in poor form after that.
